source:
**DEAL Dimension load**

This notebook loads data to deltalake table etlhubconfirme.dht_deal_dim by sourceing data from DCA deal data.
Since DCA is not accessible from Azure, a datastage job src_DCA_DEAL_Azure is executed on datastage to push the DCA extract to adls.

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO
from pyspark.sql.functions import md5, concat_ws
from sqlite3 import connect
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
#conn = connect(':memory:')

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession 
from pyspark.sql.types import * 
from delta.tables import *
from pyspark.sql.types import *
#import os
import sys

account_name = 'adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast' # fill in your primary account name 
container_name = 'etlhubfilestorage' # fill in your container name 
relative_path = 'extract/DCA/' # fill in your relative folder path 
file_name='DS_DEALS_DATA.csv' 
natural_key="DEAL_ID"
tgt_natural_key="DEAL_IDENTIFIER"
tablename="etlhubConfirmed.dht_deal_dim"
keycolumn="DEAL_KEY"

#Read data from adls csv file extracted from source at 
https://adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/etlhubfilestorage/extract/DCA/DS_DEALS_DATA.csv

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

# Read a csv file 
csv_path = adls_path + file_name
#incrementalData_DF = spark.read.csv(csv_path, header = 'true',quote='"')
incrementalData_DF=spark.read.load(csv_path,format="csv", sep="~^", inferSchema="true", header="true")
incrementalData_DF.createOrReplaceTempView('DF_req')
#incrementalData_DF.printSchema()
incrementalData_Srcreq_DF=spark.sql("select DEAL_ID,BID_SUPPORT_INET_ID,BID_SUPPORT_NOTES_ID,BUS_UNIT_ID,CLNT_NM,CLNT_NUM,COMPLEXITY,COMNTS_TXT,CMPLXTY_CMMNT_TXT,CMPLXTY_OVERRD,CNTRCT_TYP_DESC,ENGG_SPPRT_TXN_LINK_TXT,ENGG_SPPRT_TXN_NUM,INDSTRY_NM,INIT_SIEBEL_IND,CNTRY_ID,LEAD_ACCT_PRTNR_BTT_CD,LEAD_PRTNR_BTT_CD,LEAD_PRTNR_NOTES_ID,OLD_OWNR_INET_ID,OWNR_INET_ID,PROJ_DESC,OPPTNY_ID,OWNR_NOTES_ID,PARENT_DEAL_ID,PRPSL_MGR_NOTES_ID,REAS_TXT,RMVD_IND,RISK_RTNG,RISK_RTNG_CMNT_TXT,RSK_RTNG_OVERRD,SALES_STAGE_CD,SECONDARY_SERVICE,SCTR_NM,SVC_NM,SIEBEL_IND,SRC_CD,STAT_CD,RCA1_ANSWR_TXT,RCA1_ANSWR_CMMNT,RCA2_ANSWR_TXT,RCA2_ANSWR_CMMNT,RCA3_ANSWR_TXT,RCA3_ANSWR_CMMNT,RCA4_ANSWR_TXT,RCA4_ANSWR_CMMNT,RCA5_ANSWR_TXT,RCA5_ANSWR_CMMNT,RCA6_ANSWR_TXT,RCA6_ANSWR_CMMNT,RCA7_ANSWR_TXT,RCA7_ANSWR_CMMNT,RCA8_ANSWR_TXT,RCA8_ANSWR_CMMNT,APPRVR_CNT,RVWR_CNT,DEAL_TYPE,GEO_CD,HYBRD_TYPE_A,HYBRD_TYPE_B,LOAD_LOB,CRDT_RTNG,DD_OFFERG_CS_USD_AMT,DD_OFFERG_IS_USD_AMT,DD_OFFERG_SS_USD_AMT,DD_OFFERG_WCP_USD_AMT,RISK_CONSULTANT_NOTES_ID,SENIOR_SOLUTION_MANAGER_NOTES_ID,SIH_GM_NOTES_ID,RULES_EFFECTIVE_DATE,DEAL_LEAD_NOTES_ID,CNTRCT_SIGNOFF_APPRVL_STAT_CD,PAYBACK_TXT from DF_req")
#incrementalData_Srcreq_DF.show()
changedTypedf = incrementalData_Srcreq_DF.withColumn(natural_key, incrementalData_Srcreq_DF[natural_key].cast(StringType()))
#changedTypedf.printSchema()

# Get column list for creating Rec_Checksum
col_list=[]
for i in incrementalData_Srcreq_DF.columns:
    col_list.append(i)
    #print (col_list)

# Add a checsum column to help identify the changed rows

incrementalData_DF1=changedTypedf.withColumn("nk_hash",md5(natural_key))
incrementalData_DF2 = incrementalData_DF1.withColumn("column_hash", md5(concat_ws("", *col_list)))
#incrementalData_DF2.printSchema()
incrementalData_DF2.createOrReplaceTempView('incrementalData_SrcDF')

#Create a deltalake table with necessary columns

existingDataDF=spark.sql("SELECT DEAL_KEY,DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER,trim(DEAL_IDENTIFIER) as DEAL_ID,REC_CHECKSUM,IMG_CREATED_DT,REC_START_DT FROM {}  WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(tablename))
existingDataDF.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDF')

existingMaxKeyDF=spark.sql("SELECT MAX({}) existing_MAX_KEY from {} WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(keycolumn,tablename))

# prefix all columns from target table with 'existing_'. This will help to differentiate columns when incremental and existing DF's are joined

existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias('existing_'+c) for c in existingDataDF.columns])

#existingDataDF1.printSchema()
#incrementalData_DF2.printSchema()

existingDataDF1.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDataTgtDF')

fullJoin1=incrementalData_DF2.join(existingDataDF1,incrementalData_DF2.DEAL_ID == existingDataDF1.existing_DEAL_ID, "fullouter") 
fullJoin2=fullJoin1.join(existingMaxKeyDF,None,"CROSS")

fullJoin2.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')

Data Validation Checks :

- Check for duplicates in Source data based on natural key
- Check for duplicates in target delta lake table based on natural key

qry3="""
SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, {} FROM incrementalData_SrcDF GROUP BY {} HAVING COUNT(*)>1
;
"""
df3=spark.sql(qry3.format(natural_key,natural_key))
cnt1=df3.count()

print (cnt1)
if cnt1 == 0:
    print("No Duplicates in source data")
    status = 'success'
else:
    print("Below are the duplicates in source:")
    df3.show()
    status = 'fail'
    #os.abort() this will take the spark cluster also down
    sys.exit(1)
    print("This will not be printed")

qry4="""
SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, {} FROM {} where CURRENT_IND= "Y" GROUP BY {} HAVING COUNT(*)>1;
"""
df4=spark.sql(qry4.format(tgt_natural_key,tablename,tgt_natural_key))
cnt2=df4.count()
print (cnt2)
if cnt2 == 0:
    print("no duplicates in target delta lake table")
    status = 'success'
else:
    print("Below are the duplicates in target delta lake table:")
    df4.show()
    status = 'fail'
    #os.abort() this will take the spark cluster also down
    sys.exit(2)
    print("This will not be printed")

#Insert for New rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.
qry_insert="""
INSERT INTO etlhubConfirmed.dht_deal_dim
select COALESCE(A.existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS DEAL_KEY,1 as DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER , 
A.DEAL_ID,
A.BID_SUPPORT_INET_ID,
A.BID_SUPPORT_NOTES_ID,
A.BUS_UNIT_ID,
A.CLNT_NM,
A.CLNT_NUM,
REPLACE(A.COMPLEXITY,'"','') as COMPLEXITY,
REPLACE(A.COMNTS_TXT,'"','') as COMNTS_TXT,
REPLACE(A.CMPLXTY_CMMNT_TXT,'"','') as CMPLXTY_CMMNT_TXT,
REPLACE(A.CMPLXTY_OVERRD,'"','') as CMPLXTY_OVERRD,
REPLACE(A.CNTRCT_TYP_DESC,'"','') as CNTRCT_TYP_DESC,
REPLACE(A.ENGG_SPPRT_TXN_LINK_TXT,'"','') as ENGG_SPPRT_TXN_LINK_TXT,
REPLACE(A.ENGG_SPPRT_TXN_NUM,'"','') as ENGG_SPPRT_TXN_NUM,
REPLACE(A.INDSTRY_NM,'"','') as INDSTRY_NM,
REPLACE(A.INIT_SIEBEL_IND,'"','') as INIT_SIEBEL_IND,
REPLACE(A.CNTRY_ID,'"','') as CNTRY_ID,
REPLACE(A.LEAD_ACCT_PRTNR_BTT_CD,'"','') as LEAD_ACCT_PRTNR_BTT_CD,
REPLACE(A.LEAD_PRTNR_BTT_CD,'"','') as LEAD_PRTNR_BTT_CD,
REPLACE(A.LEAD_PRTNR_NOTES_ID,'"','') as LEAD_PRTNR_NOTES_ID,
REPLACE(A.OLD_OWNR_INET_ID,'"','') as OLD_OWNR_INET_ID,
REPLACE(A.OWNR_INET_ID,'"','') as OWNR_INET_ID,
REPLACE(A.proj_desc,'"','') as PROJ_DESC,
REPLACE(A.OPPTNY_ID,'"','') as OPPTNY_ID,
REPLACE(A.OWNR_NOTES_ID,'"','') as OWNR_NOTES_ID,
REPLACE(A.PARENT_DEAL_ID,'"','') as PARENT_DEAL_ID,
REPLACE(A.PRPSL_MGR_NOTES_ID,'"','') as PRPSL_MGR_NOTES_ID,
REPLACE(A.REAS_TXT,'"','') as REAS_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RMVD_IND,'"','') as RMVD_IND,
REPLACE(A.RISK_RTNG,'"','') as RISK_RTNG,
REPLACE(A.RISK_RTNG_CMNT_TXT,'"','') as RISK_RTNG_CMNT_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RSK_RTNG_OVERRD,'"','') as RSK_RTNG_OVERRD,
REPLACE(A.SALES_STAGE_CD,'"','') as SALES_STAGE_CD,
REPLACE(A.SECONDARY_SERVICE,'"','') as SECONDARY_SERVICE,
REPLACE(A.SCTR_NM,'"','') as SCTR_NM,
REPLACE(A.SVC_NM,'"','') as SVC_NM,
REPLACE(A.SIEBEL_IND,'"','') as SIEBEL_IND,
REPLACE(A.SRC_CD,'"','') as SRC_CD,
REPLACE(A.STAT_CD,'"','') as STAT_CD,
'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT,
'9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT,  A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM,'I' as REC_STATUS, 'DCA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, 
REPLACE(A.RCA1_ANSWR_TXT,'"','') as RCA1_ANSWR_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RCA1_ANSWR_CMMNT,'"','') as RCA1_ANSWR_CMMNT,
REPLACE(A.RCA2_ANSWR_TXT,'"','') as RCA2_ANSWR_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RCA2_ANSWR_CMMNT,'"','') as RCA2_ANSWR_CMMNT,
REPLACE(A.RCA3_ANSWR_TXT,'"','') as RCA3_ANSWR_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RCA3_ANSWR_CMMNT,'"','') as RCA3_ANSWR_CMMNT,
REPLACE(A.RCA4_ANSWR_TXT,'"','') as RCA4_ANSWR_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RCA4_ANSWR_CMMNT,'"','') as RCA4_ANSWR_CMMNT,
REPLACE(A.RCA5_ANSWR_TXT,'"','') as RCA5_ANSWR_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RCA5_ANSWR_CMMNT,'"','') as RCA5_ANSWR_CMMNT,
REPLACE(A.RCA6_ANSWR_TXT,'"','') as RCA6_ANSWR_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RCA6_ANSWR_CMMNT,'"','') as RCA6_ANSWR_CMMNT,
REPLACE(A.RCA7_ANSWR_TXT,'"','') as RCA7_ANSWR_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RCA7_ANSWR_CMMNT,'"','') as RCA7_ANSWR_CMMNT,
REPLACE(A.RCA8_ANSWR_TXT,'"','') as RCA8_ANSWR_TXT,
REPLACE(A.RCA8_ANSWR_CMMNT,'"','') as RCA8_ANSWR_CMMNT,
REPLACE(A.APPRVR_CNT,'"','') as APPRVR_CNT,
REPLACE(A.RVWR_CNT,'"','') as RVWR_CNT,
REPLACE(A.DEAL_TYPE,'"','') as DEAL_TYPE,
REPLACE(A.GEO_CD,'"','') as GEO_CD,
REPLACE(A.HYBRD_TYPE_A,'"','') as HYBRD_TYPE_A,
REPLACE(A.HYBRD_TYPE_B,'"','') as HYBRD_TYPE_B,
REPLACE(A.LOAD_LOB,'"','') as LOAD_LOB,
REPLACE(A.CRDT_RTNG,'"','') as CRDT_RTNG,
A.DD_OFFERG_CS_USD_AMT,
A.DD_OFFERG_IS_USD_AMT,
A.DD_OFFERG_SS_USD_AMT,
A.DD_OFFERG_WCP_USD_AMT,
REPLACE(A.RISK_CONSULTANT_NOTES_ID,'"','') as RISK_CONSULTANT_NOTES_ID,
REPLACE(A.SENIOR_SOLUTION_MANAGER_NOTES_ID,'"','') as SENIOR_SOLUTION_MANAGER_NOTES_ID,
REPLACE(A.SIH_GM_NOTES_ID,'"','') as SIH_GM_NOTES_ID,
A.RULES_EFFECTIVE_DATE,
REPLACE(A.DEAL_LEAD_NOTES_ID,'"','') as DEAL_LEAD_NOTES_ID,
REPLACE(A.CNTRCT_SIGNOFF_APPRVL_STAT_CD,'"','') as CNTRCT_SIGNOFF_APPRVL_STAT_CD,
REPLACE(A.PAYBACK_TXT,'"','') as PAYBACK_TXT,
'LG' AS DATA_IND, 
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
LEFT JOIN etlhubConfirmed.dht_deal_dim1 B
ON TRIM(A.DEAL_ID)=TRIM(B.DEAL_IDENTIFIER)
AND CURRENT_IND='Y'
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND COALESCE(B.REC_CHECKSUM,'') <> COALESCE(A.column_hash,'');
"""
d=spark.sql(qry_insert)
#d.show(10)

#update the existing rows in target table with new values and record status as U and expiry the existing records with current indicator as N.

updins="""
INSERT INTO etlhubConfirmed.dht_deal_dim 
select existing_DEAL_KEY,1+existing_DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER as DEAL_VERSION_NUMBER , 
A.DEAL_ID,
A.BID_SUPPORT_INET_ID,
A.BID_SUPPORT_NOTES_ID,
A.BUS_UNIT_ID,
A.CLNT_NM,
A.CLNT_NUM,
A.COMPLEXITY,
A.COMNTS_TXT,
A.CMPLXTY_CMMNT_TXT,
A.CMPLXTY_OVERRD,
A.CNTRCT_TYP_DESC,
A.ENGG_SPPRT_TXN_LINK_TXT,
A.ENGG_SPPRT_TXN_NUM,
A.INDSTRY_NM,
A.INIT_SIEBEL_IND,
A.CNTRY_ID,
A.LEAD_ACCT_PRTNR_BTT_CD,
A.LEAD_PRTNR_BTT_CD,
A.LEAD_PRTNR_NOTES_ID,
A.OLD_OWNR_INET_ID,
A.OWNR_INET_ID,
A.proj_desc,
A.OPPTNY_ID,
A.OWNR_NOTES_ID,
A.PARENT_DEAL_ID,
A.PRPSL_MGR_NOTES_ID,
A.REAS_TXT,
A.RMVD_IND,
A.RISK_RTNG,
A.RISK_RTNG_CMNT_TXT,
A.RSK_RTNG_OVERRD,
A.SALES_STAGE_CD,
A.SECONDARY_SERVICE,
A.SCTR_NM,
A.SVC_NM,
A.SIEBEL_IND,
A.SRC_CD,
A.STAT_CD,
'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT,
'9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT,  A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, 
'U' as REC_STATUS, 'DCA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM,
A.RCA1_ANSWR_TXT,
A.RCA1_ANSWR_CMMNT,
A.RCA2_ANSWR_TXT,
A.RCA2_ANSWR_CMMNT, 
A.RCA3_ANSWR_TXT,
A.RCA3_ANSWR_CMMNT,
A.RCA4_ANSWR_TXT,
A.RCA4_ANSWR_CMMNT,
A.RCA5_ANSWR_TXT,
A.RCA5_ANSWR_CMMNT,
A.RCA6_ANSWR_TXT,
A.RCA6_ANSWR_CMMNT,
A.RCA7_ANSWR_TXT,
A.RCA7_ANSWR_CMMNT,
A.RCA8_ANSWR_TXT,
A.RCA8_ANSWR_CMMNT,
A.APPRVR_CNT,
A.RVWR_CNT,
A.DEAL_TYPE,
A.GEO_CD,
A.HYBRD_TYPE_A,
A.HYBRD_TYPE_B,
A.LOAD_LOB,
A.CRDT_RTNG,
A.DD_OFFERG_CS_USD_AMT,
A.DD_OFFERG_IS_USD_AMT,
A.DD_OFFERG_SS_USD_AMT,
A.DD_OFFERG_WCP_USD_AMT,
A.RISK_CONSULTANT_NOTES_ID,
A.SENIOR_SOLUTION_MANAGER_NOTES_ID,
A.SIH_GM_NOTES_ID,
A.RULES_EFFECTIVE_DATE,
A.DEAL_LEAD_NOTES_ID,
A.CNTRCT_SIGNOFF_APPRVL_STAT_CD,
A.PAYBACK_TXT,
'LG' AS DATA_IND, 
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
WHERE DEAL_ID = existing_DEAL_ID and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_REC_CHECKSUM)
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.dht_deal_dim B
WHERE TRIM(A.DEAL_ID)=TRIM(B.DEAL_IDENTIFIER)
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND coalesce(A.column_hash,'')=coalesce(B.REC_CHECKSUM,'')) ;
"""
d1=spark.sql(updins)
#d1.show()

expqry="""
MERGE INTO etlhubConfirmed.dht_deal_dim A
USING fullJoin B
ON B.DEAL_ID = A.DEAL_IDENTIFIER
AND LOWER(A.DEAL_IDENTIFIER) = LOWER(B.existing_DEAL_ID) and LOWER(B.column_hash) <> LOWER(B.existing_rec_checksum)
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CURRENT_IND='N'
,REC_END_DT= existing_REC_START_DT -  INTERVAL 5 seconds
,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp;
"""
d2=spark.sql(expqry)
#d2.show()

#Soft deletes or no longer active in source
softdelqry="""
MERGE INTO etlhubConfirmed.dht_deal_dim  A
USING fullJoin B
ON A.DEAL_IDENTIFIER = B.existing_DEAL_ID
AND B.DEAL_ID is NULL
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='N' ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp;
"""
df3=spark.sql(softdelqry)

%%sql
 from etlhubConfirmed.dht_deal_dim1 where ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='N' 
    --where DEAL_IDENTIFIER in (7840900,7840899)
